amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to strike the provision allowing unions to be certified without winning a secret ballot election under certain circumstances and replaces with a requirement that all unions win a secret-ballot election in order to be certified.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the provision allowing unions to be certified without winning a secret ballot election under certain circumstances and replace it with a requirement that all unions win a secret-ballot election in order to be certified.
